greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of the constant 'a' appearing in the asymptotic expression of the number of plane partitions of n as a*n^(-25/36)*exp(b*n^(2/3)).
comment: The paper by Finch contains an error: the denominator should be sqrt(3*Pi), not sqrt(Pi). The constant 0.4009988836 is wrong. The formula in A000219 and the article by L. Mutafchiev and E. Kamenov (page 6) is correct. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Oct 27 2014. [In new version of prt.pdf is already corrected. - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 11 2015]
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5000
Steven Finch, Integer Partitions, September 22, 2004. [Cached copy, with permission of the author]
L. Mutafchiev and E. Kamenov, On The Asymptotic Formula for the Number of Plane Partitions..., C. R. Acad. Bulgare Sci. 59(2006), No. 4, 361-366.
results.author: _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 27 2014
